Package org.mobilesynergies.android.epic.service.core

Class Summary
AdministrationInterface This is the administration interface of the epic service.
ApplicationActivity Abstract convenience class that handles interaction with the epic service.
ApplicationInterface This class implements the application interface.
IntentIntegrator A utility class which helps ease integration with Barcode Scanner via Intents.
IntentResult Encapsulates the result of a barcode scan invoked through IntentIntegrator.
LoginActivity Allows the user to enter the username and password either manually or via scanning a QrCode.
MainActivity Main entry point for the user.
NetworkConnectivityStatusReceiver A broadcast receiver that informs the epic service about network connectivity updates.
Preferences Storing server and user settings.
ServiceStatusWidget A widget displaying the current status of the EpicService.
